FuncDef: The remotehelp command displays help of a particular FTP command from a remote FTP server. The remotehelp command displays help of a particular FTP command from a remote FTP server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the FTP command.
The value is a string of 1 to 16 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: The following FTP commands support help information.
